channel.title: Really need help BADLY! :S
channel.description:
Right, so when i run my server, i get this error message:
(Blanked out server name (###))
[code]### Scape is now online! Players may now join! Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 17 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:126) [/code]
But, when i compile, there is no issue... This stops me from logging in, and "black-screens" my server, for everyone, not just me.
Take a look: [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/268/errorhkh.jpg/][IMG]http://img268.imageshack.us/img268/2161/errorhkh.jpg[/img][/URL]
Please help! I'm really confused with this!

item.title: Really need help BADLY! :S
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Give us the method that line 382 is in in ItemHandler.java. Its probably a loop and you are using numbers instead of a variable to take its place.

Read full topic

item.title: Really need help BADLY! :S

item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

EDIT*

I have fixed the issue.

item.title: Really need help BADLY! :S
item.dc:creator: @guthix1pker guthix1pker
item.description:
@guthix1pker wrote:

replace it with an older one i think… or send it to me. NOTE that if you use an older or orther one that has DIFFERENT itemid’s for the items, you will fuck all drops/shops/etc up so well… make sure it the same file i had it too i think

Read full topic

item.title: Really need help BADLY! :S
item.dc:creator: @CoreVersion CoreVersion
item.description:
@CoreVersion wrote:

I didn’t change anything in my itemhandler, it’s my item.cfg i know i’ve gone wrong with, but i have no idea what i have done!

I know it’s item.cfg cause, if i replace it with an older one or a different one, the error isn’t there… but i’m just not sure what i’ve done to it to make it have an error…

Read full topic
